After receiving a generous donation from The Duncan Norman Charitable Trust in memory of the late Duncan Norman, the University of Liverpool established the Duncan Norman Research Scholarship in 2004.

Scholarship Worth

Since a scholarship will be given out each year, there will be a lot of competition.

The following funding and research assistance are provided as part of this prestigious Scholarship:

  • A competitive annual maintenance stipend of £17,000 (or a supplement to this amount if the candidate receives additional funding);
  • Full payment of tuition (home, EU, or overseas);
  • Free university housing of up to £4,635 per year;
  • or an allowance of the same amount for students who choose to live off campus;
  • A laptop or desktop computer of up to $1,000 in value;
  • Support for conference expenses of up to £500 per year in years 2 and 3.

Open to

All prospective full-time postgraduate research students, regardless of nationality, tuition status, or subject area, are eligible to apply for the Scholarship.

Criteria for eligibility

All applicants for the Duncan Norman Research Scholarship are expected to have applied for a postgraduate studentship from other sources as well, if at all possible. The studentship must be accepted, and the Duncan Norman Research Scholarship would provide additional up-front funding in such a case.

The recipients of the scholarship are required to enroll in a PhD program at the University of Liverpool and participate in any events held in Liverpool by the Duncan Norman Charitable Trust.

How to apply

  • Download the terms of the Duncan Norman Research Scholarship (Microsoft Award) and the DNRS Application Form 2024.
  • Fill out the form with correct data
  • By email only please to: scholarships@liverpool.ac.uk

Deadline & Screening Date

Applications will be accepted until Friday, April 7, 2024. After this date, no applications will be considered. Although we will make every effort to inform you of the outcome of your application, if you haven’t heard from us by July 31, 2024, you can assume that you have been unsuccessful due to the extremely high volume of applications we receive. Please be aware that this scholarship is competitive and that, despite our best efforts, we are unable to provide individual feedback.

Submitting an Application

The competition for this award is fierce: You are obligated to complete your application form, including the reference. Applications that are incomplete will not be considered. You must also include your student ID number as proof that you want to study at the postgraduate level.

Unfortunately, applications can only be submitted via email to the address listed below. Please use the scholarships email address because applications sent to other addresses may not be accepted.

Receiving an award

Payment of an award is contingent on the successful applicant receiving, accepting, and enrolling in a university program. For payment arrangements to be finalized, the successful candidate will be contacted.
